title: Beautiful script and Serif
content:
Please help me identify these 3 fonts. Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_8681_5602.JPG)
author: alisa_max

comments.content:
|LUXE Business Cards| is Aptifier Slab Black, the type below the line of script also appears to be Aptifier:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/aptifer-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060247/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/aptifer-slab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/aptifer-slab/")
